column4: You're message got truncated, what happens after you resart?

I ran sudo apt-get install linux-686 as explained on https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BinaryDriverHowto/ATI, since I've celloron P4 processor. But after installing this when I restarted ubuntu it got stuck at mounting root system. Please help me

I ran sudo apt-get install linux-686 as explained on https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BinaryDriverHowto/ATI to enable ati driver, since I've celloron P4 processor. But after installing this when I restarted ubuntu it got stuck at mounting root system. Please help me
It could be doing an fsck because the mount count exceeded 30 or whatever is set it tune2fs, let it sit for a little bit.
